4599.verse: قُل|Say|45|56|765$لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ|to those who remained behind|220|241|15896$مِنَ|of|50|71|156$ٱلْأَعْرَابِ|the Bedouins,|110|131|7817$سَتُدْعَوْنَ|`You will be called|142|163|15897$إِلَىٰ|to|53|64|118$قَوْمٍ|a people,|81|104|3192$أُوْلِى بَأْسٍ|possessors of military might|203|250|15898$شَدِيدٍ|great;|67|114|8651$تُقَـٰتِلُونَهُمْ|you will fight them,|147|194|15899$أَوْ|or|41|64|154$يُسْلِمُونَ‌ۖ|they will submit.|128|136|15900$فَإِن|Then if|66|83|227$تُطِيعُواْ|you obey,|89|106|3120$يُؤْتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah will give you|137|154|15901$أَجْرًا|a reward|78|95|4008$حَسَنًا‌ۖ|good;|69|86|2160$وَإِن|but if|58|66|213$تَتَوَلَّوْاْ|you turn away|116|140|8542$كَمَا|as|53|102|110$تَوَلَّيْتُم|you turned away|132|180|634$مِّن قَبْلُ|before,|92|140|250$يُعَذِّبْكُمْ|He will punish you|138|162|7580$عَذَابًا|(with) a punishment|153|376|2933$أَلِيمًا|painful.`|76|299|3828$

4601.verse: ۞ لَّقَدْ|Certainly|90|125|8817$رَضِىَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah was pleased|137|208|5402$عَنِ|with|54|124|1663$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believers|107|178|1964$إِذْ|when|55|90|1198$يُبَايِعُونَكَ|they pledged allegiance to you|224|235|15869$تَحْتَ|under|68|90|11341$ٱلشَّجَرَةِ|the tree,|93|115|6303$فَعَلِمَ|and He knew|105|127|15903$مَا|what|53|75|262$فِى|(was) in|74|85|89$قُلُوبِهِمْ|their hearts,|102|120|66$فَأَنزَلَ|so He sent down|131|166|15904$ٱلسَّكِينَةَ|the tranquility|113|148|15859$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|125|22$وَأَثَـٰبَهُمْ|and rewarded them|148|166|15905$فَتْحًا|(with) a victory|124|366|13003$قَرِيبًا|near,|68|310|7604$

4602.verse: وَمَغَانِمَ|And spoils of war|133|148|15906$كَثِيرَةً|much|74|105|15907$يَأْخُذُونَهَا‌ۗ|that they will take;|148|179|15908$وَكَانَ|and is|71|102|363$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|84|123$عَزِيزًا|All-Mighty,|91|106|4091$حَكِيمًا|All-Wise.|78|78|3763$

4603.verse: وَعَدَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has promised you|171|179|15909$مَغَانِمَ|spoils of war|103|118|15887$كَثِيرَةً|much|74|90|15907$تَأْخُذُونَهَا|that you will take it,|155|170|15910$فَعَجَّلَ|and He has hastened|160|168|15911$لَكُمْ|for you|67|82|207$هَـٰذِهِۦ|this|73|102|374$وَكَفَّ|and has withheld|132|161|15912$أَيْدِىَ|(the) hands|98|127|15913$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the people|120|149|75$عَنكُمْ|from you -|90|104|507$وَلِتَكُونَ|that it may be|115|133|15914$ءَايَةً|a sign|60|97|2339$لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|for the believers|128|165|923$وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ|and He may guide you|167|204|3917$صِرَٲطًا|(to the) Path|108|126|11206$مُّسْتَقِيمًا|Straight.|94|94|6024$

4605.verse: وَلَوْ|And if,|63|70|179$قَـٰتَلَكُمُ|fight you,|84|99|15916$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|104|59$لَوَلَّوُاْ|surely they would turn|169|184|15917$ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ|the backs.|90|105|3169$ثُمَّ|Then|53|60|293$لَا|not|42|71|30$يَجِدُونَ|they would find|122|181|4484$وَلِيًّا|any protector|111|170|4037$وَلَا|and not|71|130|25$نَصِيرًا|any helper.|94|123|4039$

4606.verse: سُنَّةَ|(The established) way|168|181|10483$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|107|606$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|87|232$قَدْ خَلَتْ|passed away|106|132|1225$مِن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before,|92|118|250$وَلَن|and never|86|99|229$تَجِدَ|you will find|98|178|4073$لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ|in (the) way of Allah|156|316|15918$تَبْدِيلاً|any change.|102|182|13986$

4599.verse: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."

4600.verse: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment.

4601.verse: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

4602.verse: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

4603.verse: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path.

4604.verse: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.

4605.verse: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper.

4606.verse: [This is] the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change.
